description.value: Any time corruption points are gained, reduce value by 1 (min 0). May make a Free Action to ignore accumulated effects of corruption points for 1 Round.

system.benefit: Any time corruption points are gained, reduce value by 1 (min 0). May make a Free Action to ignore accumulated effects of corruption points for 1 Round.

specialAbilities.name: Reduce Corruption Gained
specialAbilities.description: Any time you gain Corruption Points, reduce the amount by 1 (minimum 0).

specialAbilities.name: Ignore Corruption Effects
specialAbilities.description: As a Free Action, you may ignore the accumulated effects of your Corruption Points for 1 round.
